title: Autoimmune-Only Production Model
diseases: renal angiomyolipoma and tuberous sclerosis complex tsc
systemic sclerosis associated interstitial lung disease
findings:
AUTOIMMUNE-ONLY PRODUCTION MODEL ANALYSIS:

1. ALL autoimmune predictions are HIGH confidence (480 total)
   - This validates h71's finding that autoimmune is a "safe" category

2. 76% of predictions (367/480) are NOVEL repurposing opportunities
   - 16 unique autoimmune diseases
   - 211 unique drugs

3. TOP DRUG CLASSES:
   - Corticosteroids (Prednisolone, Methylprednisolone, Dexamethasone): 5-7 diseases each
   - Immunomodulators (Tocilizumab, Abatacept): 5 diseases each
   - Local anesthetics (Lidocaine, Bupivacaine): 6 diseases (anti-inflammatory effect)

4. NOTABLE PREDICTIONS:
   - Baricitinib → SLE (JAK inhibitor, already in trials)
   - Adalimumab → MS, SLE (TNF inhibitor, validated mechanism)
   - Hydroxychloroquine → MS (known autoimmune modulator)

5. VALIDATION STATUS:
   - Predictions align with known autoimmune drug mechanisms
   - Many are already being tested in clinical trials
   - High confidence justified by mechanistic plausibility
